column4: Tourism;Sihanoukville------:Â On the morning of February 22
column6: there were strong winds and high waves off the coast of Sihanoukville.------Many small boat fishermen have complained that it is very difficult to go fishing because of the rough seas.------Officials from the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Department of Water Resources and Meteorology have said that the storm began at dawn and will ease off around noon.------Authorities have called on maritime travelers to be alert for high winds
